title: Diazo Print, "Design for Textile-Charred Wood, Series #004", before 1952
medium: Blueprint and black colored pencil on white wove paper
signed: Lower right in graphite: "Alexander Girard Design"
inscribed: In graphite, lower right: "Charred Wood" "series #004" / "Alexander Girard Design"
description: White freely rendered stick, or tree-like titled vertical marks punctuated with short horizontal crossing strokes. ( Negative image of original drawing.) Small black triangles lower right, left, and lower center mark registration of image.

tombstone.epitaph: Diazo Print, "Design for Textile-Charred Wood, Series #004", before 1952.Blueprint and black colored pencil on white wove paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-217.
